mapper.select: select DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.type, m.icon, m.url, m.order_number, m.status, m.parent_id, m.creater, m.ctime, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.permission,m.component_path,m.hasChildren from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.type in (1,2) and m.status=1 order by m.order_number ASC
